Target: An ontology for representing geospatial information and design characteristics of manufacturing facilities and data centres operated by a company.

Comment: An institution created to conduct business [WordNet].
Label: Company

Comment: A location where industrial activities are performed.
Label: IndustrialFacility

Comment: A manufacturing facility.
Label: Factory

Comment: A factory established to produce printed products.
Label: Printing Plant

Comment: A factory established to produce semiconductor products.
Label: Semiconductor Plant

Comment: A factory established to produce precision engineering products.
Label: Precision Engineering Plant

Comment: A factory established to produce food.
Label: Food Plant

Comment: A factory established to produce beverages.
Label: Beverage Plant

Comment: A factory established to produce pharmaceuticals.
Label: Pharmaceutical Plant

Comment: A factory established to produce chemicals.
Label: Chemical plant

Comment: A centre for housing servers and storage devices that manage and store data.
Label: Data Centre

Comment: An economic sector that groups businesses that offer products or services.
Label: Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce printed products.
Label: Printing Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce semiconductor products.
Label: Semiconductor Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce precision engineering products.
Label: Precision Engineering Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce food.
Label: Food Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce beverages.
Label: Beverage Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce pharmaceuticals.
Label: Pharmaceutical Industry

Comment: An industry established to produce chemicals.
Label: Chemical Industry

Comment: A centre for housing servers that store data.
Label: Information and Communication Technology Industry

Comment: A property of an industrial facility.
Label: industrial facility property

Comment: A property assigned to an industrial facility.
Label: industrial facility property

Comment: A relationship between a factory or data centre and its corresponding economic sector.
Label: belongs to industry

Comment: A structure that has a roof and walls and stands more or less permanently in one place [WordNet].
Label: Building

Comment: The utilisation of power to satisfy needs or in manufacturing, e.g., chemical manufacturing.
Label: Power Consumption

Comment: The total amount of income of an organization prior to any deductions.
Label: Revenue

Comment: A relationship between two spatial objects.
Label: contains

Comment: A relationship between a company and the entities it owns.
Label: is owner of

Comment: A relationship between a company and its annual revenue
Label: revenue

Comment: A relationship between an entity and its annual power consumption.
Label: power consumption

Comment: An attribute of a Company.
Label: company property

Comment: A relationship between a company and its year of formation.
Label: year of establishment

Comment: A relationship between a company and its sectoral description.
Label: sectoral description

Comment: A relationship between a company and its SSIC code corresponding to sectoral description (Singapore specific).
Label: SSIC code

Comment: A relationship between a company and its number of employees.
Label: number of employees

Comment: A relationship between a company and its main business activity.
Label: business activity

Comment: A relationship between a company and the production technology/process it uses.
Label: production technology

Comment: Address of a spatial entity.
Label: Address

Comment: Details about the land lot associated with the address of an entity.
Label: Land Lot Details

Comment: Two dimensional size of a defined part of a surface, typically a region bounded by a closed curve.
Label: Area

Comment: A relationship between a spatial entity and its address.
Label: address

Comment: A relationship between an address and land lot details.
Label: land lot details

Comment: A relationship between a land lot and its area.
Label: lot area

Comment: A relationship between a building and its corresponding instance IRI in OntoCityGml.
Label: OntoCityGML representation

Comment: A relationship between an entity and its latitude in EPSG24500.
Label: latitude in EPSG24500

Comment: A relationship between an entity and its longitude in EPSG24500.
Label: longitude in EPSG24500

Comment: A relationship between a land lot and its associated ID.
Label: land lot number

Comment: A relationship between an address and its associated postal code.
Label: postal code

Comment: A property of a data centre.
Label: Data Centre property

Comment: The maximum IT capacity of a data centre.
Label: Maximum IT Capacity

Comment: A relation between a data centre and its maximum IT capacity.
Label: Maximum IT Capacity

Comment: The typical utilization rate of a data centre.
Label: Utilization Rate

Comment: A relation between a data centre and its typical utilization rate.
Label: Utilization Rate

Comment: The total floor area of an industrial facility
Label: floor area

Comment: The total floor area of an industrial facility
Label: floor area

Comment: A relation between an industrial facility and its gross floor area.
Label: floor area

Comment: A property of a factory
Label: factory property

Comment: Design capacity of a factory.
Label: Design Capacity

Comment: A relationship between a factory and its design capacity.
Label: design capacity

Comment: Specific energy consumption of a factory. It refers to the quantity of energy used per unit mass of product or unit of sales revenue.
Label: Specific Energy Consumption

Comment: A relationship between a chemical plant and its design capacity.
Label: specific energy consumption

Comment: The average amount of heat emitted by each printer within a printing facility.
Label: Generated Heat Per Printer

Comment: A relationship between a printing plant and the average amount of heat emitted by each printer within the facility
Label: Generated Heat Per Printer

Comment: The amount of energy used per unit floor area of factory space.
Label: Energy Consumption Per Unit Floor Area

Comment: A relationship between a factory and the amount of energy used per unit floor area.
Label: Energy Consumption Per Unit Floor Area

Comment: Estimated value of annual CO2 emission for the entire factory.
Label: Plant CO2 emission

Comment: A relationship between a factory and its overall annual CO2 emission.
Label: plant CO2 emission

Comment: The proportion of input energy converted to useful work.
Label: Thermal Efficiency

Comment: A relationship between a factory and its thermal efficiency.
Label: Thermal Efficiency

Comment: Calculated value of annual heat emission for a company's main emitting sources.
Label: Heat Emissions

Comment: A relationship between an entity and its annual heat emission.
Label: Generated Heat
